clause.title: Ramp gradient, crossfall, surface profile and slip resistance for ramps used by wheelchairs

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Compliance with Performance Requirement D1P2, relating to gradient, crossfall, surface profile and slip resistance of a ramp for the use of wheelchairs is verified when—

ol.li: the ramp has a gradient that is not steeper than 1:8; and
the pushing force required to accelerate a wheelchair and user during ascent is in accordance with (2); and
the required braking force for a wheelchair and user during descent is in accordance with (3); and
the projected ascent time is in accordance with (4); and
the ramp crossfall, surface profile and slip resistance is in accordance with (5).

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The pushing force during ascent must be in accordance with the formula:
where—

F p MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOramaaBa aaleaacaWGWbaabeaaaaa@37E0@ R0lGODlhFAAZAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAFAAZAAACK4SPqcvtD6MEodog8dGQ08h5TzhdYkNmWzmt LWUp1dfGNa2e43y//AsMOgoAIf8LTWF0aFR5cGUwMDHaBQEABwREU01UNwABE1dpbkFsbEJhc2lj Q29kZVBhZ2VzABEFVGltZXMgTmV3IFJvbWFuABEDU3ltYm9sABEFQ291cmllciBOZXcAEQRNVCBF eHRyYQASAAghL0WPRC9BUPQQD0dfQVDyHx5BUPQVD0EA9EX0JfSPQl9BAPQQD0NfQQD0j0X0Kl9I 9I9BAPQQD0D0j0F/SPQQD0EqX0RfRfRfRfRfQQ8MAQABAAECAgICAAIAAQEBAAMAAQAEAAAKAQAC AINGAAMAGwAACwEAAgCDcAAAAQEAAAAAIf8LTWF0aFR5cGUwMDPlPD94bWwgdmVyc2lvbj0iMS4w Ij8+PCEtLSBNYXRoVHlwZUBUcmFuc2xhdG9yQDVANUBNYXRoTUwyIChDbGlwYm9hcmQpLnRkbEBN YXRoTUwgMi4wIChDbGlwYm9hcmQpQCAtLT48bWF0aCB4bWxucz0naHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcv MTk5OC9NYXRoL01hdGhNTCc+PG1yb3c+PG1zdWI+PG1pPkY8L21pPjxtaT5wPC9taT48L21zdWI+ PC9tcm93PjwvbWF0aD48IS0tIE1hdGhUeXBlQEVuZEA1QDVAIC0tPgAh/wtNYXRoVHlwZTAwMgYJ AAAAAAAAOw== = the maximum force during ascent, equal to 40 N for ramps required to be usable by the general public; and

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The braking force during descent must be less than 9 N when calculated in accordance with the formula:
where—

F b MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOramaaBa aaleaacaWGIbaabeaaaaa@37D2@ R0lGODlhEgAYAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAEgAYAAACK4SPqcvtD2MKtAZ4T3Yb9LV9TBhZokJiWome 3ghWEyW9Lmrc01vr9Q8MAgoAIf8LTWF0aFR5cGUwMDHaBQEABwREU01UNwABE1dpbkFsbEJhc2lj Q29kZVBhZ2VzABEFVGltZXMgTmV3IFJvbWFuABEDU3ltYm9sABEFQ291cmllciBOZXcAEQRNVCBF eHRyYQASAAghL0WPRC9BUPQQD0dfQVDyHx5BUPQVD0EA9EX0JfSPQl9BAPQQD0NfQQD0j0X0Kl9I 9I9BAPQQD0D0j0F/SPQQD0EqX0RfRfRfRfRfQQ8MAQABAAECAgICAAIAAQEBAAMAAQAEAAAKAQAC AINGAAMAGwAACwEAAgCDYgAAAQEAAAAAIf8LTWF0aFR5cGUwMDPlPD94bWwgdmVyc2lvbj0iMS4w Ij8+PCEtLSBNYXRoVHlwZUBUcmFuc2xhdG9yQDVANUBNYXRoTUwyIChDbGlwYm9hcmQpLnRkbEBN YXRoTUwgMi4wIChDbGlwYm9hcmQpQCAtLT48bWF0aCB4bWxucz0naHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcv MTk5OC9NYXRoL01hdGhNTCc+PG1yb3c+PG1zdWI+PG1pPkY8L21pPjxtaT5iPC9taT48L21zdWI+ PC9tcm93PjwvbWF0aD48IS0tIE1hdGhUeXBlQEVuZEA1QDVAIC0tPgAh/wtNYXRoVHlwZTAwMgYI AAAAAAAAOw== = the braking force during descent; and

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The time taken to ascend the ramp must be less than 17 s when calculated in accordance with the formula:
where—

T MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamivaaaa@36CD@ R0lGODlhDgARAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAADgARAAACHISPqcsdD2EKhxp7kcWKu6aBmQh4jNmREcm2 YAEAIf8LTWF0aFR5cGUwMDHJBQEABwREU01UNwABE1dpbkFsbEJhc2ljQ29kZVBhZ2VzABEFVGlt ZXMgTmV3IFJvbWFuABEDU3ltYm9sABEFQ291cmllciBOZXcAEQRNVCBFeHRyYQASAAghL0WPRC9B UPQQD0dfQVDyHx5BUPQVD0EA9EX0JfSPQl9BAPQQD0NfQQD0j0X0Kl9I9I9BAPQQD0D0j0F/SPQQ D0EqX0RfRfRfRfRfQQ8MAQABAAECAgICAAIAAQEBAAMAAQAEAAAKAQACAINUAAAAACH/C01hdGhU eXBlMDAzwTw/eG1sIHZlcnNpb249IjEuMCI/PjwhLS0gTWF0aFR5cGVAVHJhbnNsYXRvckA1QDVA TWF0aE1MMiAoQ2xpcGJvYXJkKS50ZGxATWF0aE1MIDIuMCAoQ2xpcGJvYXJkKUAgLS0+PG1hdGgg eG1sbnM9J2h0dHA6Ly93d3cudzMub3JnLzE5OTgvTWF0aC9NYXRoTUwnPjxtaT5UPC9taT48L21h dGg+PCEtLSBNYXRoVHlwZUBFbmRANUA1QCAtLT4AIf8LTWF0aFR5cGUwMDIGAgAAAAAAADs= = the time taken to ascend the ramp in seconds; and

L MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamitaaaa@36C5@ R0lGODlhDgARAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAADgARAAACGoSPqct9AYMDclJbZ3abdW9dz9J90fmFqlUA ACH/C01hdGhUeXBlMDAxyQUBAAcERFNNVDcAARNXaW5BbGxCYXNpY0NvZGVQYWdlcwARBVRpbWVz IE5ldyBSb21hbgARA1N5bWJvbAARBUNvdXJpZXIgTmV3ABEETVQgRXh0cmEAEgAIIS9Fj0QvQVD0 EA9HX0FQ8h8eQVD0FQ9BAPRF9CX0j0JfQQD0EA9DX0EA9I9F9CpfSPSPQQD0EA9A9I9Bf0j0EA9B Kl9EX0X0X0X0X0EPDAEAAQABAgICAgACAAEBAQADAAEABAAACgEAAgCDTAAAAAAh/wtNYXRoVHlw ZTAwM8E8P3htbCB2ZXJzaW9uPSIxLjAiPz48IS0tIE1hdGhUeXBlQFRyYW5zbGF0b3JANUA1QE1h dGhNTDIgKENsaXBib2FyZCkudGRsQE1hdGhNTCAyLjAgKENsaXBib2FyZClAIC0tPjxtYXRoIHht bG5zPSdodHRwOi8vd3d3LnczLm9yZy8xOTk4L01hdGgvTWF0aE1MJz48bWk+TDwvbWk+PC9tYXRo PjwhLS0gTWF0aFR5cGVARW5kQDVANUAgLS0+ACH/C01hdGhUeXBlMDAyBgIAAAAAAAA7 = the length of the ramp in metres; and

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The crossfall must be no steeper than, the surface profile must be no rougher than, and the slip resistance must be no less than, the values nominated in Table D1V3 for the gradient of the ramp.
